DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether intra-articular hyaluronic acid provides symptomatic relief of osteoarthritis of the knee.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Effectiveness Study of a Non-Crosslinked HA Alkylamide HYADD(TM) 4 Hydrogel for Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic osteoarthritis of the knee. No disorders which could interfere with study required assessments.
